ygData.subject: Re:  Treants
ygData.msgSnippet: You can solo them around 24 with a good pet, but chances of you finding a solo treant with the constant camping of that spawn are next to nil. you just send
ygData.messageBody:
You "can" solo them around 24 with a good pet, but chances of you finding a
solo treant with the constant camping of that spawn are next to nil.
you just send the pet and then constant SOP until it dies...treants have a
hard time ignoring your pet until it's too late. This is assuming you have
a decent INT level for enough mana.



----- Original Message -----
From: James Harless <jharless@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 21, 1999 2:04 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Treants


> From: "James Harless" <jharless@...>
>
> You can fight treants solo as a necromancer. I was doing it around 30th,
> but, I'm sure you can do it earlier. I'm talking of the same 2 treant
spawn
> that you are, I believe. Don't forget about Fear.
>
>
> > From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
> >
> > You can't fight treants solo.....they are camped by
> > players 24x7 :)
> >
> > --- Dino Buffetta <DBuffett@...> wrote:
> > > I was in SK and con'ed a Treant he con'ed yellow at
> > > 22nd now 23rd I have not con'ed any yet. But what
> > > lvl can a necro solo this GOODIE LOSERS. And maybe
> > > some tactics to fighting them. And also what lvl are
> > > the Millers in Q. hills my gnome necro friend told
> > > me that he went from 24th to 29th fighting them only
> > > (only problem he had was to get there spawn
> > > separated. I am a no wimpy necro I love to fght
> > > yellows and reds (SOLO).
> > >
> > >
